hymn.title: Is your life a channel of blessing
hymn.category: Preaching of the Gospel—A Channel of Blessing
hymn.chords: | C. G7. | C. C/E. | Dm/F. Dm. | G. G7. | C. G7. | C. C/E. | Dm/F. Dm. | G. G7. | C F/C/ C. | C. C/E. | Dm. G. | F. C/E. | D7. G. | C. F. | G7. C. | F. C/E. | Dm G7/ C. |

layout.singingstanza: Is your life a chan -- nel of bless -- ing? Is the love of God flow -- ing through you? Are you tell -- ing the lost of the Sav -- ior? Are you rea -- dy His serv -- ice to do? Make me a chan -- nel of bless -- ing to -- day, Make me a chan -- nel of bless -- ing, I pray; My life pos -- sess -- ing, my serv -- ice bless -- ing, Make me a chan -- nel of bless -- ing to -- day.

lyrics.stanza: Is your life a channel of blessing? Is the love of God flowing through you? Are you telling the lost of the Savior? Are you ready His service to do?
Make me a channel of blessing today, Make me a channel of blessing, I pray; My life possessing, my service blessing, Make me a channel of blessing today.
Is your life a channel of blessing? Are you burdened for those that are lost? Have you urged upon those who are straying, The Savior who died on the cross?
We cannot be channels of blessing If our lives are not free from all sin; We will barriers be and a hindrance To those we are trying to win.
